desc: The ultimate "kitchen sink" starter: one massive template ready for fast AI-powered customization.
article:
Introducing the ultimate âkitchen sinkâ template, a massive collection of landing pages, sections, and components designed for unparalleled flexibility. This all-in-one solution features dedicated layouts for SaaS, portfolios, services, and blogs, all presented with a minimalist aesthetic thatâs easy to customize. Delete what you donât need and leverage the included AI rule files for Cursor and Windsurf to effortlessly update designs and styles. This template comes packed with a comprehensive set of pre-configured content collections for Keystatic, internationalization (i18n) support, and a vast array of components and page types, including author pages, pricing sections, career postings, and even user authentication pages. Itâs the perfect foundation for developers and creators looking to build robust, feature-rich websites with maximum efficiency and creative freedom.

Features

General

  • 200+ unique components / routes
  • 100/100 Pagespeed, Accessibility, and Best Practices scores on Lighthouse
  • Landing page examples for SaaS, Portfolio, Services, and more.

Internationalization Capabilities

  • Easy configuration with "npm run config-i18n"
  • Route translations with wildcard support
  • Content collection localization capabilities through a frontmatter "mappingKey"\
  • Text translations
  • Language switcher components

Projects

  • Projects content collection with Keystatic CMS support
  • Multiple projects sections for landing and other pages
  • Individual projects pages and a projects index

Careers

  • Careers content collection with Keystatic CMS support
  • Individual careers pages and a careers index

Services

  • Services content collection with Keystatic CMS support
  • Multiple services sections for landing and other pages
  • Individual services pages and a services index

Resume

  • Resume content collection with Keystatic CMS support
  • Resume page and download option

Blog

  • Blog posts, and Authors content collections with Keystatic CMS support
  • Category and tag support
  • Pagination for blog index and category and tag pages
  • Multiple blog post layouts including table of contents
  • Author pages
  • RSS feed

SEO

  • JsonLD schema for blog posts and other pages
  • Hreflang and other tags for multi-language websites
  • BaseLayout component you can pass a title, description, and optional image to for SEO purposes
  • OpenGraph and Twitter card metadata

Forms

  • Login, signup, and forgot password forms / pages
  • Multiple contact form options

Other

  • Dedicated general AI rules for Cursor and Windsurf
  • AI context files for styling, internationalization features, and general development
  • Legal pages with Keystatic CMS support
  • About page
  • 404 page
  • Prettier and ESLint pre-configured
  • Netlify deployment ready, with documentation for small Vercel or Cloudflare Pages adjustments
  • Custom scroll-based animations
  • Detailed documentation on features
  • View transitions enabled, with a one-line config change to disable.
  • Fully responsive
